40.ara-name: كتاب الإيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Zaid bin Arqam:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whenever a man makes a promise and he intends to fulfill it, but he does not fulfill it, then there is no burden upon him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عَلاَمَةِ الْمُنَافِقِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Signs Of The Hypocrite
